original_text: When Adonijah had tried to become king, Joab had joined with him. (But he had not joined with Absalom.) Joab heard the news about what had happened to Adonijah and Abiathar. So he hurried to the Lord's holy tent. He took hold of the horns of the altar there.
korean_text: 그 소문이 요압에게 들리매 그가 여호와의 장막으로 도망하여 제단 뿔을 잡으니 이는 그가 다윗을 떠나 압살롬을 따르지 아니하였으나 아도니야를 따랐음이더라

sentences.original_text: When Adonijah had tried to become king
But he had not joined with Absalom
about what had happened to Adonijah and Abiathar
sentences.korean_translation: 아도니야와 아비아달에게 무슨 일이 일어났는지에 대한

sentences.original_text: So he hurried to the Lord's holy tent
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 서둘러 주님의 성막으로 갔다

sentences.original_text: He took hold of the horns of the altar there
